meanings.definition: The act of making a high-pitched sound, as a cat does.
meanings.sent1: The meowing of the kitten was so cute.
meanings.sent2: I heard the meowing of a cat outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The meowing of the cat interrupted our conversation.
meanings.sent4: The meowing of the cat filled the silent room like music.
meanings.sent5: The meowing of the cat echoed through the house.

meanings.definition: To make a meow sound, as a cat does.
meanings.sent1: The cat was meowing loudly for food.
meanings.sent2: I can hear my cat meowing for attention.
meanings.sent3: She started meowing when she saw her favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The cat meowing in the middle of the night woke me up.
meanings.sent5: The kitten meowing softly was a soothing sound.
